DOC.brief_summary: Part 1 : To identify Maximum Tolerated Dose ( MTD ) level LEO 43204 daily treatment two consecutive day Part 2 : To evaluate efficacy LEO 43204 two dos daily treatment two consecutive day compare vehicle
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Escalating Doses LEO 43204 Applied Once Daily Two Consecutive Days Approximately 250 cm2 Trunk Extremities Subjects With Actinic Keratosis
DOC.criteria: Part 1 : Subjects 5 20 clinically typical , visible discrete AKs arm Part 2 : Subjects 5 20 clinically typical , visible discrete AKs extremity trunk Location treatment area within 5 cm incompletely heal wound within 5 cm suspect basal cell carcinoma ( BCC ) squamous cell carcinoma ( SCC ) Prior treatment ingenol mebutate gel treatment area Lesions treatment area : atypical clinical appearance ( e.g. , hypertrophic , hyperkeratotic cutaneous horn ) and/or recalcitrant disease ( e.g. , respond cryotherapy two previous occasion )
